mapper.select: SELECT match_no AS matchNo, hometeam_name AS hometeamName, awayteam_name AS awayteamName, hometeam_goals AS hometeamGoals, awayteam_goals AS awayteamGoals FROM match_result WHERE match_no IN( SELECT match_no AS matchNo FROM match_schedule WHERE match_date = CURDATE() AND active = 'T' AND match_time < CURRENT_TIME() )
